DescriptionData.Title: Jump Rope Fitness Weight Loss Fat Burning Aggravated Aggravated Exercise Training, Freely Adjustable Length, Non-slip Handle
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives. Skipping is an indispensable sport.

★ The Benefits of Skipping Rope
1. Skipping on the body's sensitivity, physical posture, balance, coordination and flexibility have a good role in promoting. It is beneficial to development, especially lower limb strength.
2. Skipping can help children grow taller.
3. Skipping is effective and economical way to burn fat.

★ Features
1. Lightweight when using, feel light and natural.
2. It is non-toxic and odorless and has a smooth surface to grip comfortably.
3 Very strong, not knotted.
4. It is suitable for indoor or outdoor activity
5. Perfect for your kids as a birthday or Christmas gift.

★ Specifications:
Material: sponge
Color: orange
Applicable scene: fitness equipment, fitness body
Uses: weight loss, fitness, entertainment, training
Rope size: 2.8m(110.2in)

★ Package List:
1 x Jump Rope

★ Note:
- There may be 1 inch difference in measurement since it is hand measured.Hope you do not mind it.
- There may be a little color difference due to different monitor settings.Thank you for your understanding.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: THE BENEFITS OF SKIPPING ROPE: Help to strengthen human muscles and heart and lung function, increase the vitality of brain nerve cells, and improve the ability to think and respond.
FREE ADJUSTMENT: Adjust the rope length according to your height and rope skipping habits for more comfortable exercise and suitable for all family members.
NON-SLIP HANDLES: Thickened elastic non-slip sweat-absorbent foam handle, it is more slip-resistant when sweating, allowing you to experience the fun of sports.

FOR EVERYONE: Functional fitness, boxing, MMA, intervals, circuits, hiit conditioning training and fat loss. The Fitness Rope is for everyone: men, women, girls, boys. Fast efficient rotations at maximum rpm.

CUSTOMER SERVICE: If you have any questions, please contact us(LYTLD) and we will solve it within 24 hours. Please feel free to contact our customer service team to give feedback on your situation. We are very happy to provide guidance and services.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: skipping rope adjustable jump aluminum alloy speed ropes loss weight boxing indoor outdoor exercises fat burning adjuster premium high spec aluminium conditioning hiit interval training automatic counting professional exercise fast calorie

DescriptionData.Title: Skipping Rope for Fitness, Adjustable Jump Rope, Not Easy to Wind, Easy to Carry, Non-slip Handle Ideal for Boys and Girls Fitness
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives. Skipping is an indispensable sport.

★ The Benefits of Skipping Rope
1. Skipping on the body's sensitivity, physical posture, balance, coordination and flexibility have a good role in promoting. It is beneficial to development, especially lower limb strength.
2. Skipping can help children grow taller.
3. Skipping is effective and economical way to burn fat.

★ Features
1. Lightweight when using, feel light and natural.
2. It is non-toxic and odorless and has a smooth surface to grip comfortably.
3 Very strong, not knotted.
4. It is suitable for indoor or outdoor activity
5. Perfect for your kids as a birthday or Christmas gift.

★ Specifications:
Material: PP, PVC
Color: blue+black, orange+black, white+black
Applicable scene: fitness equipment, fitness body
Uses: weight loss, fitness, entertainment, training
Rope size: 3.1m(122.0in)

★ Package List:
1 x Jump Rope

★ Note:
- There may be 1 inch difference in measurement since it is hand measured.Hope you do not mind it.
- There may be a little color difference due to different monitor settings.Thank you for your understanding.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: FREE ADJUSTMENT: Adjust the rope length according to your height and rope skipping habits for more comfortable exercise and suitable for all family members.

PREVENT ENTANGLEMENT: The buckle design is convenient for adjusting the rope body. When choosing a length suitable for your own jump rope, the rope body can be smoothly rotated to avoid the trouble of winding the rope body.
THE BENEFITS OF SKIPPING ROPE: Help to strengthen human muscles and heart and lung function, increase the vitality of brain nerve cells, and improve the ability to think and respond.
NON-SLIP HANDLE: Comfortable handle design, PP material is more durable, soft rubber anti-slip ring at the bottom, more non-slip when sweating, anti-off hand let you experience the fun of sports.

CUSTOMER SERVICE: If you have any questions, please contact us(LYTLD) and we will solve it within 24 hours. Please feel free to contact our customer service team to give feedback on your situation. We are very happy to provide guidance and services.

DescriptionData.Title: Skipping Ropes, Adjustable Tangle-Free Jump Rope for Fitness Indoor Outdoor Fun Exercise Workout Keeping Fit Weight Loss and Training
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives. Skipping is an indispensable sport.

★ The Benefits of Skipping Rope

2. It is non-toxic and odorless and has a smooth surface to grip comfortably.
3 Very strong, not knotted.
4. It is suitable for indoor or outdoor activity
5. Perfect for your kids as a birthday or Christmas gift.

★ Specifications:
Material: TPU
Color: blue, green, orange, purple, red, black
Applicable scene: fitness equipment, fitness body
Uses: weight loss, fitness, entertainment, training
Rope size: 3m(118.1in)

★ Package List:
1 x Jump Rope

★ Note:
- There may be 1 inch difference in measurement since it is hand measured.Hope you do not mind it.
- There may be a little color difference due to different monitor settings.Thank you for your understanding.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: FREE ADJUSTMENT: Adjust the rope length according to your height and rope skipping habits for more comfortable exercise and suitable for all family members.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PROTABLE: Being feather-light makes it easily and conveniently portable so that you can achieve maximum fat burn, tone your muscles and reach peak fitness anywhere.

CORRECT POSTURE OF SKIPPING ROPE: The body stands naturally, the ankles are slightly staggered, the forearm hangs down from the upper arm close to the body, and the palms are opposite or downward to the wrist to force the rope.
THE BENEFITS OF SKIPPING ROPE: Help to strengthen human muscles and heart and lung function, increase the vitality of brain nerve cells, and improve the ability to think and respond.

DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives. Skipping is an indispensable sport.

★ The Benefits of Skipping Rope
1. Skipping on the body's sensitivity, physical posture, balance, coordination and flexibility have a good role in promoting. It is beneficial to development, especially lower limb strength.
2. Skipping can help children grow taller.
3. Skipping is effective and economical way to burn fat.

★ Features
1. Lightweight when using, feel light and natural.
2. It is non-toxic and odorless and has a smooth surface to grip comfortably.
